sections.heading: Notice of hearing on petition to adopt; service8-111
sections.text: Notice of hearing on petition to adopt; serviceAfter a petition to adopt has been filed, the clerk of the superior court shall set a time and place for a hearing by the court. Notice shall be as provided for the service of process in civil actions

sections.heading: of hearing on petition to adopt; service
